blogPost.title: How can individuals act as agents of change in their communities and workplaces? Answer by @JennaNicholas, CEO, Impact Experience. https://t.co/tYAMgbgacE https://t.co/kN8XpaFFKe
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 個人がコミュニティや職場で変革の担い手として行動するには？Answer by @JennaNicholas, CEO, Impact Experience. https://t.co/tYAMgbgacE https://t.co/kN8XpaFFKe
个人如何在社区和工作场所中充当变革的推动者？由Impact Experience首席执行官@JennaNicholas回答。https://t.co/tYAMgbgacE https://t.co/kN8XpaFFKe。
個人如何在社區和工作場所中充當變革的推動者？由Impact Experience首席執行官@JennaNicholas回答。https://t.co/tYAMgbgacE https://t.co/kN8XpaFFKe。

previous.title: What was it like to start a company and a family at the same time? Answer by Vlada Bortnik, founder of Marco Polo App. https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt

localize.full_text: 会社と家庭を同時に立ち上げるのはどんな感じでしたか？回答：Vlada Bortnik（Marco Polo Appの創業者） https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt
同时成立公司和家庭是什么感觉？马可波罗App创始人Vlada Bortnik回答：https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt。
同時成立公司和家庭是什麼感覺？馬可波羅App創始人Vlada Bortnik回答：https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt。

next.title: How can you conduct online team building activities? Answer by Ilma Nausedaite, COO at The Remote Company. https://t.co/CtXMJCYgWY https://t.co/QesNoGXuWT

localize.full_text: オンラインでチームビルディング活動を行うには？The Remote CompanyのCOOであるIlma Nausedaite氏の回答。https://t.co/CtXMJCYgWY https://t.co/QesNoGXuWT
如何开展线上团队建设活动？由远程公司首席运营官Ilma Nausedaite回答。https://t.co/CtXMJCYgWY https://t.co/QesNoGXuWT。
如何開展線上團隊建設活動？由遠程公司首席運營官Ilma Nausedaite回答。https://t.co/CtXMJCYgWY https://t.co/QesNoGXuWT。
